Class LoopInfo<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cassite.style.LoopInfo<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - last loop result type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IteratorInfo

    public class LoopInfo<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Info about current Iterator.
    It's a subclass of LoopInfo
    Author:
    wkgcass

      R initRes(R init)
      set the last result to given value if it's null
      it won't effect the last value of the loop.
      it's only a simplified way of reducing null value of lastRes.

      • initRes

        public R initRes(R init)
        set the last result to given value if it's null
        it won't effect the last value of the loop.
        it's only a simplified way of reducing null value of lastRes.
        Parameters:
        init - the initial value
        Returns:
        the init value itself
